mapper.select: SELECT mc_no, mc_nm, mc_company_no, mc_main_nm, mc_addr, mc_main_image, mc_email, mc_pw, mc_tel, mc_introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM makeup_company

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CEIL (rownum / 10) page, mc_no, mc_nm, mc_company_no, mc_main_nm, mc_addr, mc_main_image, mc_email, mc_pw, mc_tel, mc_introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM (SELECT * FROM makeup_company order by mc_no desc)) WHERE page = #{page}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, mc_no, mc_nm, mc_company_no, mc_main_nm, mc_addr, mc_main_image, mc_email, mc_pw, mc_tel, mc_introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM makeup_company WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} and mc_no > 0 order by mc_no DESC ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(mc_no) FROM makeup_company WHERE mc_no > 0
